General.Name: Novabase S.G.P.S. S.A
General.Description: Novabase S.G.P.S., S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides IT consulting and services in Portugal, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Next-Gen and Value Portfolio. The Next-Gen segment develops IT consulting and services to banks, insurance, capital markets, and telecommunication sectors. This segment operates under the Celfocus brand name. The Value Portfolio segment operates and develops IT consulting, staffing, and services under the Neotalent brand. This segment involves in venture capital activities. Novabase S.G.P.S., S.A. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal.
General.Address: Av. D. João II, Lisbon, Portugal, 1998-031
